snippet: Peggy Lynch, the wife of the departing Democratic mayor of Seattle, Mike McGinn, was arrested during a rally inside the state’s Republican Party headquarters.
abstract: Peggy Lynch, wife of Seattle's departing Democratic Mayor Mike McGinn, is among protesters arrested during a immigration policy rally inside state’s Republican Party headquarters.
lead_paragraph: Peggy Lynch, the wife of the departing Democratic mayor of Seattle, Mike McGinn, was arrested during a rally inside the state’s Republican Party headquarters.

headline.main: Washington: Wife of Seattle Mayor Among Arrested Protesters
headline.print_headline: Washington: Wife of Seattle Mayor Among Arrested Protesters
